item.title: With Nosferatu, Robert Eggers Has Now Made 2 Stealth Adaptations Of Literary Classics In A Row
item.description: Robert Egger's last film, The Northman, and his most recent film, Nosferatu, both adapt classic works of literature in unconventional ways.

item.title: 10 Actors Who Didn't Like Being In The MCU
item.description: While many movie stars clamour for a role in the MCU, several Marvel actors have stated that they didn’t really enjoy working with the franchise.

item.title: A John Ford Western Lost For More Than 100 Years Found In Its Entirety: “There Are Films That Decide To Live”
item.description: A John Ford movie from 1918, one of his oldest works, that was thought to be lost to history has been recovered in its entirety in Chile.
